titles.title: Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
A bill to designate a mountain peak in the State of Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak".
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment. With written report No. 115-94.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 124.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
This bill designates as the Alex Diekmann Peak the 9,765-foot peak located 2.2 miles west-northwest of Finger Mountain on the western boundary of the Lee Metcalf Wilderness in Montana.
